response.original_title: Love in the Hotel: Unconditional Pampering
response.overview: Before getting engaged, Lin Xi escapes from an unfaithful relationship and becomes pregnant by Fu Chiye, heir to an empire in Shanghai. The grand hotel where she works is bought by Fu Chiye, who pursues her relentlessly. Determined to achieve her independence, Lin Xi works hard to establish herself at the hotel and ends up being deeply loved by the heir.
response.title: Love in the Hotel: Unconditional Pampering
